summary: More than 25 years experience in IT (application) management, of which 21 years in ERP environments (Finance, Supply Chain, Order Management, BI). Currently working for Cargill in the Netherlands as a Tech Lead for the implementation of SAP Ariba. Global and cross functional experience within the consultancy industry (CGI, Ordina, Mosaic and Oracle the Netherlands). Experienced in project management, process improvement, change management and people development. Currently focused on managing 3 development teams (Cognizant: Procurement, Wipro: Payables, CBS: Dell-Boomi). I’m a Process Driven Improvement Enthusiast striving to deliver first class Customer and End User service. Strong leadership, vision, highly motivated and passion are some of my key characteristics.

education.degree_name: Working according to SDM (SDW, ISAC, Yourdon, Codd, etc)

profile_positions.description:
•	Implemented a Rule engine Framework in Oracle to determine the cash forecast per bank -Ritchie has more than 100 internal bank accounts - and to be able to generate one payment batch for all countries and legal entities within Ritchie Bros and integrate this with Kyriba (Treasury Management System)
•	Implementing a Treasury Management System (Kyriba) and responsible for setting up Bank Accounts, Cash Flows, Interfaces in Oracle and Kyriba.
•	Implement a test strategy between Oracle and Kyriba (wrote more than 160 scripts for the business and did the follow up in JIRA). Test Integration between Oracle and Kyriba for Bank statements. 
•	Offering Post go live support to the Business. Reconciling GL, AP, AR, and CM and between Oracle and Oracle.
•	Implementing an Operational Reporting System to track the outstanding unreconciled transactions.
•	Implement AME for GL for EMEA.
profile_positions.title: Senior Product Owner Oracle , Kyriba

profile_positions.description:
•	Implementing Oracle eBS within 5 countries (Germany, Spain, Dubai, Netherlands and Austria):
- Write functional and technical designs, testing, conversions and training. The full life cycle of changes.
•	Coaching team members in supporting the business and taking ownership of the problems.
•	Support and participate in continuous improvement process of PTP,ATC, QTC and PTM. 
•	Enforce Oracle e-business standards: Developed a toolkit (CSR tracking portal) for implementing Oracle eBS within the company. Mainly focused on managing the releases of the changes.
•	Setting up a Global Development Center in Chennai (India) and leading the GDC and still expanding the Center (Currently a team of 17 persons). 
•	Development Manager of 2 external Oracle Solution Providers (L&T, HCL). (Minimum headcount was 4 and a maximum of 30). 
•	Arranged the introduction of APEX within Flowserve and build several applications and selling those applications within the company.
•	Business application Manager (member of the Request Review Committee).
•	Responsible for defining the budget, budget approvals and monitor the actuals of the GDC.
•	Green belt Certified and doing post certifications every year. 
•	Black belt trained. Worked on a project to bring back the closing of the books from 7 to 4 days.
•	Supporting VP’s in tier 1 initiatives (profitability per site, working capital per site).
•	Develop standards for Supplier Information Management (OTD’s, PVV’s).
•	Developed a BI strategy for Operational Reporting and currently developing and rolling out the strategy (also won an Oracle Speakers Award for presenting this at the UKOUG). 
•	Responsible for selecting an Automated Testing Suite (Tosca). Rollout (2018).
•	Support the BI team in optimizing the BI tool (SAP BO) and rolling it out to the sites.
•	Project Advisor for the implementation of S4/Hana in Debrecen (moving from Oracle to S4/Hana). 
•	Supported Business Analysts from procure to pay.
